medium: Lacquer, styrofoam, linen, Japanese paper, shell, eggshell, gold powder
title: This One
text: Mie is a young, up-and-coming artist who studied lacquer techniques under Tanaka Nobuyuki, a sculptor and leading contemporary master of the medium, at Kanazawa College of Art. This eye-catching work, her largest so far, impressively showcases her new approach to lacquer while retaining established techniques.
description: large brown eyeball with reddish iris; textured on back; smooth on iris and retina
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
